snippet.title: 10 Lines Princess - MSX Homebrew
snippet.description:
Developed for the BASIC 10Liner 2023 contest, 10 Lines Princess is a sequel to the already impressive 10 Lines Hero, which was itself an entry to the 2021 edition of the contest. This time, killing enemies changes your color to allow for hazard immunity and more effective healing, among many improvements. The hero saved the princess, but after the hero had been captured, can the princess rescue her savior?

itch.io link: https://bunsen.itch.io/10-lines-princess-by-honoppe

#basic10liner #basictenliner #tenlines #tenliner #msx #msx2 #msxhomebrew #msx2homebrew #10lineshero #homebrew #homebrewgames #rpg #roleplayinggame #honoppe #10linesprincess
